mapper.select: select * from aftersales_service where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into aftersales_service(gmt_create, gmt_modified, goods_type, apply_time, apply_reason, end_time, type, number, order_item_id,is_deleted,be_applied) values (now(),now(),#{goodsType},now(),#{applyReason},#{endTime},#{type},#{number},#{orderItemId},0,0)
